name: brawlCetateaObjects
description:
Modified Cetatea Town objects used by template Brawl, should be better suited for short games on small maps.
Ancient Citadel: defended by 5x 1-2 Nosferatu Lords, 7 of them in total, reward: 1500 Gold, 2-4 Crystals and Gems (6 total)
All creatures that have upgrades, both guards and rewards have a chance of being upgraded.
All banks recharge after 4 full days pass.
They are not designed to be taken with your whole army but with parts of your army in multiple places at once.
author: Warzyw647

chinese.name: Brawl模板血堡城镇小物件
chinese.description:
专为Brawl模板定制的改良版血堡城镇物件，适用于小型地图。
古城堡：由5队1-2只血族亲王守护，总共有7只，奖励为1500金币，2-4颗水晶和宝石（共6颗）。
所有可升级的生物，无论是守卫还是奖励生物，都可能出现升级后的生物。
所有宝屋每4天刷新一次。
这些物件不是设计来让你用全部兵力去攻打的，而是让你分散成多支小股部队同时攻打多处地点。
